verses.text: Ach in Diosal, a ach tza b'o yaj in lolonel, tak'vej in ayic tzin avaj t'ayach. Ayic ay in och t'a syaelal ix in a colani. Ok'ocab' a k'ool t'ayin ticnaic, ab' tas sval t'a in lesal tik.
Ex vetanimail, ¿b'aq'uinh ol eyactejcan eyalan in pecal? ¿B'aq'uinh ol eyactejcan eyalan lolonel malaj yelk'ochi? ¿B'aq'uinh ol eyactejcan e sayan tas manh yeloc?
Ab'ec, a Jehová ix sik'ancanel eb' anima ayoch spensar t'ay, yic wach' tz'och eb' yicoc. Ayic tzin avaj t'ay, stak'vi t'ayin.
Xivanhec d'ha Dios, yic manhxo ol och e mul. Ayic jichan ex eq'ui, a val yic te numan, tze b'eyk'olan e b'a.
Hak'ek och Jehová yipoc e k'ool, aq'ek e silab' t'ay icha val t'a smojal.
Tzijtum eb' tz'alani: ¿Mach ol ch'oxan svach'il t'ayonh? xchi eb'. Mamin Jehová, ch'ox a wach'k'olal t'ayonh.
Ha ach ix ak'cot tzalajk'olal t'ayin, ek'to t'a yichanh stzalajk'olal eb' niwan tas syik' t'a smunlajel.
Malaj tas tzin na' ayic tzin ek' jichan, te junk'olal tzin vayi. Mamin Jehová, a ach ton ayach och ved'oc, yuj chi' malaj tas tzin ik'ani.
